name: Space is strange
description:
PLEASE PLAY IT FULLSCREEN! Bugs may occure, sorry for that, but in general the game is playable.

That was a horrible day for starship RYAN-2822. The vehicle entered a Strange Space Area, and somehow only one mechanic was left on board. Yep, it's you! Good news is you CAN rescue everybody by reaching captain's bridge. Bad news is you'll never know what to expect around the corner , because this part of space play lots of tricks with space, time and the ship. Your mission is to repair all the breakage on ship and get rid of aliens, which are breaking the vehicle and attacking you. 

Good luck, pal!

Controls:

D, A – go forward and backward 

LMB - attack 

RMB - laser gun shooting

Q - go to another room

E - repair breakage (if you have enough resources)

4 – light grenade 

5 – first aid kit 

6 – time expander 

To repair breakages you should use anything you can find. 

Game by MAD LAB team:

Ivan Dolgikh - programming

Mariya Kshnyakina - art, game design
